name: Boost (itch) (Anri_Lombard)
description:
This is BOOST!

The lights seem to have disappeared, so try to navigate your way to the launch pad without touching the walls.

Make sure to get some flips in as the rocket has a torch at the ready.

CONTROLS

Left and right: left arrow or A key, and right arrow or D key.

Boost: Space bar.

HAPPY BOOSTING!
